name: Peridian
description:
Created for UCI GDIM 61 class.

Based on the Asian mythology of the 4 Guardians and the 4 Perils, Peridian is a 2D platformer that is both fast-paced and challenging. Embark on a quest to save the world from total destruction and obtain special abilities that will aid you on this journey. Are you up for the challenge?
